name: Waifusion

wallet.noWaifusMain: You don't have any waifus baka

dungeon.description: Oh no... Many of our beloved waifus have been enslaved in the Dungeon! Be a hero and save your beloved Waifus by buying thier freedom for 0.7 ETH to get a random Waifu. Or burn a Waifu and pay 5,490 WET to free another random one from the Dungeon.
dungeon.exitWarning: Reveal Waifus before exiting or you can lose them forever

bodys.buy: Select the number of Waifus that you would like to buy
bodys.burn: Select the Waifus you would like to burn
bodys.loadingPurchase: When purchase is complete you must reveal immediately or risk losing your Waifus forever
bodys.revealReady: Your Waifus have been purchased! Click Reveal below to see what you got

wet.overview: The Waifu Enhancement Token (WET) is an exclusive token to the Waifusion world wide harem. There are two uses for the WET Token:
use: Renaming your Waifu to a new name perminantly stored on the Ethereum Blockchain
Burning an undesirable Waifu in exchange for a new Waifu from the Dungeon
wet.detail: Waifus passively generate WET tokens just by holding them! Each Waifu will generate 3,660 WET per year. You can claim your WET tokens in the wallet page. To change the name of a Waifu, you need to send 1,830 WET. To burn a Waifu you need to send a Waifu and 5,490 WET to the Waifusion contract, they will disappear forever...
